      • addRent

        public Rent addRent​(Rent newRent,
                    int staffID,
                    int customerID,
                    int storeID)
        Add new Rent to the DataBase with given params and Return the Rent with the associated RentID.
        Parameters:
        newRent - Rent with Default Date Values.
        staffID - ID of the current Staff Member.
        customerID - ID of the current Selected Customer.
        storeID - ID of the currently Selected Store.
        Returns:
        Rent Returns the Rent as OBJ with the associated RentID.

      • getFreeInventoryIDFROMBookID

        public Book getFreeInventoryIDFROMBookID​(Book newBook,
                                         java.lang.String startDate,
                                         java.lang.String endDate,
                                         int storeID)
        Get a Free Inventory ID from a Book between start AND end Date + the Given Store.
        Parameters:
        newBook - The Book which we want to search a new Inventory ID.
        startDate - Start Date of the Selection.
        endDate - End Date of the Selection.
        storeID - ID of the Selected Store.
        Returns:
        Book Return the modified Book with its new Free Inventory ID.
